common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get the detail information of video.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: videoUploadIdList all illegal,no record in database

error_list.name: unauthorized
error_list.description: The user is not authorized and needs to be in toggle

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

You can only select one from video_upload_id and post_id: 

- If you want to get detail information of video with draft status, please pass video_upload_id.

- If you want to get detail information of video with post status, please pass post_id.

","name":"video_upload_id","sample":"sg-11110199-6v99e-mgezdwct5eyya0","type":"string","required":"False","key":"NNSQcS"},{"description":"

You can only select one from video_upload_id and post_id: 

- If you want to get detail information of video with draft status, please pass video_upload_id.

- If you want to get detail information of video with post status, please pass post_id.

","name":"post_id","sample":"YwOo_gZqCACXbM0UAAAAAA==","type":"string","required":"False","key":"RxCbEnK"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"mCJEdjT"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FrmsHkd"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"2af852cd-7420-4714-b7cd-33317f6fe548","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nmSRWYc"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"iTFHbrD","children":[{"description":"

ID of uploaded video.

","name":"video_upload_id","sample":"id-11110201-6ko2m-mczrffx878mba3","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FpNXfJE"},{"description":"

The unique identifier for post Shopee Video. Only have value when the video status is 300 (POSTED).

","name":"post_id","sample":"YwOo_gZqCACXbM0UAAAAAA==","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mHayMW"},{"description":"

The time when the video post to Shopee Video. Only have value when the video status is 300 (POSTED).

","name":"post_time","sample":"1761188662147","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"SDJpHxQ"},{"description":"

Video play url.

","name":"video_url","sample":"https://down-bs-id.vod.susercontent.com/c3/50007225/201/A3oxONdWALgpg8thEbEBACc.mp4","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NyJkKFi"},{"description":"

Video current status. Applicable values:

200: DRAFT
300: POSTED

400: DELETED

500: SCHEDULED
600: SCHEDULED_FAILED

","name":"status","sample":"300","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"itmRKXE"},{"description":"

Cover image url of the Shopee Video.

","name":"cover_image_url","sample":"https://down-sp-id.vod.susercontent.com/c3/50007225/201/A3oyOUXSAFAbg8thIfYBBgAn.jpg","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HQsjSDK"},{"description":"

Description of the Shopee Video.

","name":"caption","sample":"#tt Tt1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xmJkbbW"},{"description":"

Video duration time in millisecond.

","name":"duration","sample":"6866","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"mQfrkhz"},{"description":"

View count of post Shopee Video. Only have value when the video status is 300 (POSTED).

","name":"views","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TsFAha"},{"description":"

Like count of post Shopee Video. Only have value when the video status is 300 (POSTED).

","name":"likes","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"nmitbSF"},{"description":"

Comment count the post Shopee Video. Only have value when the video status is 300 (POSTED).

","name":"comments","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"RZXrRQj"},{"description":"

Whether there is video metric data.

","name":"has_performance","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"nQTJXxm"},{"description":"

List of products linked with the Shopee Video.

","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"iHkRhen","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a shop of the item.

","name":"shop_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"YcFxxHC"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"34002","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"SkCTjiN"},{"description":"

Name of the item.

","name":"item_name","sample":"seller discount","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ECrtkaz"},{"description":"

Name of the item displayed on Shopee Video (max 255 characters).

","name":"custom_item_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WhySiJF"},{"description":"

Cover image url of the item.

","name":"item_cover_image_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jiHpirQ"},{"description":"

Min price of the item.

","name":"min_price","sample":"100000.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"kPCseeB"},{"description":"

Max price of the item.

","name":"max_price","sample":"100000.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"EhMYAWw"},{"description":"

Stock of the item.

","name":"stock","sample":"10","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"mSSaXJj"}]},{"description":"

Whether allow stitch and duet.

","name":"allow_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"bpwBxhy","children":[{"description":"

Whether allow stitch.

","name":"allow_stitch","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"WmBMtZW"},{"description":"

Whether allow duet.

","name":"allow_duet","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"nPzGpKy"}]},{"description":"

When scheduled_post is true, scheduled_post_time must not empty.

When scheduled_post is false, scheduled_post_time must empty.

","name":"scheduled_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"stECcp","children":[{"description":"

Whether post it to Shopee Video at scheduled time.

","name":"scheduled_post","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"fbreTjc"},{"description":"

Scheduled post time, millisecond timestamp.

","name":"scheduled_post_time","sample":"1761734929450","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"wncbDYJ"}]},{"description":"

The lasted update time the video.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1761188662147","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"BKejYbQ"}]}]}
